helpers.ibanRecommendation: Adding the IBAN helps match transfers and automate reconciliations.

deleteWarning.single: There's 1 manual card linked to this account. Deleting it will unlink the card, which will remain saved without an associated account.
deleteWarning.plural: There are {{count}} manual cards linked to this account. Deleting it will unlink them so each card stays saved without an associated account.

deletePortfolioWarning.single: There's 1 manual fund portfolio linked to this account. Deleting it will unlink the portfolio, which will remain saved without an associated account.
deletePortfolioWarning.plural: There are {{count}} manual fund portfolios linked to this account. Deleting it will unlink them so each portfolio stays saved without an associated account.

popovers.cocNotApplicable: Since the purchase was fully financed (no own capital), cash-on-cash based KPIs are not applicable.
popovers.breakEvenNotApplicable: Break-even requires positive net cashflow and own capital invested. With 100% financing, break-even doesnâ€™t apply.

loans.principalOutstandingInfo: Required to compute equity and some KPIs (e.g., ROE and real-estate distribution).
loans.totalLoanAmountInfo: Used to compute capital contributed and financing ratio. Provide it for accurate CoC-related KPIs.
loans.monthlyInterestInfo: Used to estimate taxes and total return (principal amortization excluded).
